name: Void Rats
description:
A single level game done for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2022.
Move with WASD (rotate Q&E) or Arrow keys, hold right mouse button to look around.

Sound design by Abigale Tucker:

https://abigaletucker.wixsite.com/sounddesign

Visual assets from UE Markeplace (Paragon character and Sci Fi Starter bundle).

Known issues:

  • very slow movement on most systems
  • cabinet near the end of the level locks movement
